itemDescription: Irish physician, known for his original observations in heart disease (1802-1880)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Dominic John Corrigan, 1st Baronet (2 December 1802 – 1 February 1880), was an Irish physician, known for his original observations in heart disease. The abnormal "collapsing" pulse of aortic valve insufficiency is named Corrigan's pulse after him.
